about_the_game:
**《Interstellar Pioneering》**is a fun and challenging casual game that takes you into a mysterious starry world. Here, you collect energy, expand your territory, acquire more resources, and build a vast starry empire!

Game Features:

Starry Construction: Expand plots in the vast starry sky, search for energy gems, and build larger star regions.
Resource Management: Allocate and manage resources wisely to ensure your empire continuously expands and develops.
Sprite Assistants: Recruit cute sprites that will help you collect resources, build territories, and improve your efficiency.
Strategic Expansion: Plan your expansion strategy, balancing resource consumption and gains.
detailed_description:
**《Interstellar Pioneering》**is a fun and challenging casual game that takes you into a mysterious starry world. Here, you collect energy, expand your territory, acquire more resources, and build a vast starry empire!

Game Features:

Starry Construction: Expand plots in the vast starry sky, search for energy gems, and build larger star regions.
Resource Management: Allocate and manage resources wisely to ensure your empire continuously expands and develops.
Sprite Assistants: Recruit cute sprites that will help you collect resources, build territories, and improve your efficiency.
Strategic Expansion: Plan your expansion strategy, balancing resource consumption and gains.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i3-3220T 2.8GHz
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra 10.12.6
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2415M 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Interstellar Pioneering

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above versions
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 series
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated HD 6100+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: **《Interstellar Pioneering》**is a casual game where players collect energy gems in the starry sky, expand their territory, and gather resources. Recruit fairy helpers to assist in collecting and managing resources, balancing expansion and consumption to create a vast starry world.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, German, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
